name: Boxing Rampage
description:
Description

Step out of the ring and fight to become the World Champion and beyond in a retro inspired Boxing Adventure.
Create and Upgrade your Boxer, get special abilities, gloves and skins to Box ’Em Up!
Pure Arcade Fighting Action with a Sci Fi Punch!
Humans, Robots, Cyborgs and Aliens, no matter the planet when they hit the ground, the bigger they are, the harder they fall.
Put your gloves on and defeat waves of opponents in the ultimate Boxing Rampage!

Controls

W,A,S,D / Arrows - Movement
Mouse clicks / Z,X / JK - Punches
Special Abilities - Combinations + Both Punches
Explained in-game

Visit us at:
http://dragonflygamestudio.com/
